data.title: How many husbands and ex-boyfriends did Kim Kardashian have?
data.meta_description: KEEPING Up With The Kardashian's star Kim Kardashian is seeking joint custody of her four kids with rapper Kanye West after filing for divorce.A sourc
data.text:
KEEPING Up With The Kardashian's star Kim Kardashian is seeking joint custody of her four kids with rapper Kanye West after filing for divorce.

A source said the KKW Beauty founder has been “remaking her image as a devoted mother,” and is looking to “eventually enter politics,” as she works towards her law degree.

How many times has Kim Kardashian been married?

Kim Kardashian has been married three times, first to Damon Thomas, then Kris Humphries and lastly Kanye West.

Kanye West

Kim and Kanye's relationship timeline has its ups and downs.

They met in 2003 but wouldn't get together for a long time as they began a friendship and Kim saw other people.

Kanye famously said in 2013 that he'd wanted to be with Kim for a while.

He said: "I just knew I wanted her to be my girl for a long time."

In 2011 they started dating when Kim flew out to Paris for Kanye's fashion show and in 2012 he named Kim in a song.

In 2014 they got married in Florence and had already had their first child by this point.

By 2020 their marriage was looking to be on the rocks - first there was drama around Kanye's presidential campaign and subsequent mental health breakdown, then it was rumoured that the couple were living separately, and by the end of the year Kim was no longer wearing her ring.

On February 19 2021 it was reported that Kim Kardashian filed for divorce from Kanye West, after six years of marriage.

Together they have four children: North, Psalm, Chicago, and Saint.

Kris Humphries

Kris is an American basketball player.

Kris was Kim's second husband - for a total for 72 days in 2011.

Kanye has said he was texting Kim before the wedding, trying to convince her not to go through with it.

They had been dating for just seven months before the wedding that is now thought of by many as being a publicity stunt.

They spent $10 million dollars on their wedding, with the cake alone costing $20,000.

Their divorce was legally finalised in June 2013.

Damon Thomas

Damon is a songwriter who was married to Kim from 2000 to 2004.

Kim said years later she was high on ecstasy when they married.

She was just 19 years old at the time of their wedding and since their divorce the marriage has been viewed in a controversial light.

Kim claimed he became physically violent towards her and was controlling of her whereabouts and actions - something that Damon denies, instead arguing that he was the one who filed for divorce.

Who else has Kim Kardashian dated?

Ray J

Ray J is a rapper who is remembered for allegedly selling his sex tape with Kim Kardashian - he did this after their split in 2007.

He went on to marry Princess Love, though they are in the process of a divorce.

Nick Lachey

They dated in 2006 after Nick's high profile divorce from Jessica Simpson.

He has since claimed that Kim used him for publicity.

Nick Cannon

Nick and Kim dated from 2006 to 2007, reportedly splitting over her infamous sex tape.

Nick was married to Mariah Carey who he also has children with.

Kim also dated NFL player Reggie Bush and American footballer Miles Austin.

Neither romance had a high profile ending as both relationships appeared to finish on good terms.

Are Kim and Kanye divorcing?

Kim Kardashian has reportedly filed for divorce from Kanye West after six years of marriage.

The couple have "lived separate lives" in the months since the rapper's public mental health breakdown.

Kim is reportedly asking for joint legal and physical custody of the couple's 4 kids.

Who has Kim Kardashian been linked to since her separation?

Kim has not publicly dated anyone since filing for divorce from Kanye. However, she has been linked to Van Jones and Maluma. She did reportedly shoot down rumors that she was dating Van.

A source told E! that Kim is happy being single, but is open to dating in the future. “She would like to find someone down to earth and normal. That hasn't happened yet. She's not in a rush and is happy being single. Eventually she would like to find someone again but it has to be the right person.”
